title: Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #3: Drugg
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/katiemix3-copy-900x567.jpg "katiemix3 copy")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5602-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-3-drugg/attachment/katiemix3-copy)Gaining a rapidly expanding fan base both in London and throughout the rest of the UK, Drugg is one of the most exciting artists in the witch haus scene at the moment. We were delighted when he agreed to put together an Exclusive Mix for Crack in the Road. Combining arguably the most diverse track selection of our three mixes so far, it’s a really fantastic listen and is available to hear below.

 [Drugg – Crack in the Road Exclusive Mix #3](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad/drugg-crack-in-the-road) by [crackintheroad](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad)

Tracklisting:

Black Dice – Urban Supermist  
Lukid – Hair of the Dog  
Minutemen – Paranoid Chant  
Earl Sweatshirt – Earl  
Women – Untogether  
Grouper – Heavy Water/I’d Rather be Sleeping  
Lizzy Mercier Descloux – Room Mate  
Mohammed Al Madloul – unknown  
Cybertron – Clear  
David Axelrod – The Smile  
MF Doom – Saliva  
Dinosaur – Gargoyle  
Seefeel – Dead Guitars  
Fadimoutou Wallet Inamoud – Unknown  
Cocteau Twins – Lorelei  
Gil Scott Heron – B Movie  
Group Home – Supa Star  
Jacaszek – Rytm to Niesmiertelnosc  
Teebs – You’ve Changed

If you haven’t heard any of Drugg’s music, then check it out [here.](http://soundcloud.com/druggworld) Also keep checking back for our interview with Drugg in a couple of weeks time, when we’ll catch up with him at [The Old Blue Last.](http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=107583989321750&ref=ts)
